text: What would Reagan do? (sometimes abbreviated WWRD) is a phrase that has become popular among conservatives and Republicans in the United States.Currie, Duncan. What Does "Reagan Republican" Mean In '07? CBS News, 2007-05-25. It is based on "What would Jesus do?".O'Beirne, Kate. What Would Reagan Do? , National Review Online, 2006-06-02. It is used as the belief in what former United States President Ronald Reagan would do in modern day problems.Kessler, Jim. What would Reagan Do? Third Way, 2008-09-25 Reagan was a model conservative leader whose philosophy and policies provide guidance and a good example for modern politicians.Herdt, Timm. 10 favor rekindling Reagan spirit , Ventura County Star, 2007-05-04. ==References== Category:Ronald Reagan Category:Phrases
title: What would Reagan do?
